title: Lovinâ€™ You More Every Day
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm loving you more, more, darling
Loving you more every day
I'm loving you more, sho' 'nuff now, in every way now
Oh, you got me so I can't eat (
Eat a bite
)
And I can't sleep (
Can't sleep a wink
)
Everybody gonna start talkin'
Askin' what are you, what are you doin' to me?
I tell 'em you're makin' me love you more
(
More, more, more, more, and more
)
I'm loving you more every day, oh, yes I do (
Every day
)
[Verse 2]
I said I'm gonna love you, I wanna love you
Not only on weekends, I wanna love you every day
And not just for a boyfriend
I want you to marry me, oh, and take me home to stay, yay, yay, yay
And if I get you, I'll have a full-time job
I'm gonna work hard all day
'Cause when you come home to me, little boy
I know, I know, I know I'm gonna get my pay
For lovin' you more, more, more
(
More, more, more, more, more, and more, every day
)
[Outro]
And if I get you, and if I get you, I'm gonna treat you right
I'm gonna love you day and night
And if you, and if you argue, and if you argue with me
All I'm gonna do is just squeeze you tight
And keep on lovin' you more, more, more, more, more
And more, every day
More, more, more, more, more, and more
